lead_paragraph: The “Top Chef” celebrity has cooked for Oprah Winfrey and two Florida governors. Now he has grand plans to put a poor swath of North Florida to work.

headline.main: Art Smith, Chef to Stars, Turns to His Neglected Hometown

snippet: The “Top Chef” celebrity has cooked for Oprah Winfrey and two Florida governors. Now he has grand plans to put a poor swath of North Florida to work.
abstract: Chef and restaurateur Art Smith moves back to his hometown of Jasper, one of Florida’s poorest counties, with ambitious plan to invigorate local economy by establishing commercial bakery complex to make Southern cakes and other items for his fork-to-table restaurant at Disney World; shares recipe for key lime poundcake.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Disney, Walt, World (Lake Buena Vista, Fla)
